'''1.21.92''' is a hotfix to ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on June 19, 2025 on most platforms, June 20, 2025 on Xbox and Fire OS and June 24, 2025 for Nintendo Switch. This version fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/37486954069645-Minecraft-1-21-92-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.92 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 19, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.92
|220496|Tridents no longer damage mobs after being moved by a piston or trapdoor in certain situations
|221318|Skyboxes in texture packs do not render
|222048|Joining a world in splitscreen causes the secondary player to use a guest account
|otherissuescount=3}}
'''Other'''
*Fixed an issue that could cause players to get disconnected from multiplayer worlds when attempting to add split-screen players.
*Items that are less than 16 pixels in width or height now render properly again.
*Fixed to restore original behavior where null components in entity definition files were allowed to parse and load correctly.
